mapper.sql: EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM
mapper.insert: insert into EMP (EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM) values (#{empno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{comm,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into EMP
EMPNO,
ENAME,
JOB,
MGR,
HIREDATE,
SAL,
COMM,

mapper.update:
update EMP
ENAME = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MGR = #{mgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HIREDATE = #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SAL = #{sal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMM = #{comm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where EMPNO = #{empno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update EMP set ENAME = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MGR = #{mgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HIREDATE = #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SAL = #{sal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMM = #{comm,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where EMPNO = #{empno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
